creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: three pendants connected by round and floral link chains: flower, butterfly, and floral motifs; flower pendant has four chains, each with a small pendant - two balls and two seed-like shapes; butterfly pendant has four chains, each with a small pendant - two balls and two stylized birds; largest floral motif pendant has two chains with ball and fish pendants on each and five additional chains with small spoon, tweezers and three blade shapes
object_name: Hair Ornament, one of a pair
title: Hair Ornament, one of a pair
